description:
The mascot of Romance Kiss.
Miss Romance is a lilac squirrel with a very puffy purple curled tail she normally rests on, adorned with a single gem and gold studs to match those in her ponytail. On her tail and bangs is a single curled red line to match the lips marking on her tail. She has purple fluff on her neck adorned with the same stones. Her dark blue eyes are accented with pale pink blushed cheeks and purple eyelids.
She was shown to be one of the two hosts in the "It`s Yozora`s Fashion Time" program, alongside Yozora.
name: Miss Romance
